translations.translation: Did We not destroy the earlier peoples,
Have We not destroyed the earlier generations?
Did We not destroy many a nation of the earlier times?
Did We not destroy the ancient people
Did We not destroy the earlier people?
Did We not destroy the ancients
Did We not destroy the former generations?
Did We not destroy the ancients,
Destroyed We not the former folk,
Did We not destroy the earlier peoples?
Did We not destroy the former generations,
Did We not destroy the men of old (for their evil)?
Did We not destroy the ancients?
Did We not destroy the ancients
Did We not destroy the ancients?
Did We not destroy the former peoples?
[77:16] Did We not destroy the ancients, for their denial, in other words, We certainly destroyed them,
(Destroyed We not the former folk) by means of death as well as chastisement,

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { أَلَمْ نُهْلِكِ } المكذبين { ٱلأَوَّلِينَ } [المرسلات: 16] كقوم نوح وعاد وثمَّود، ولم نستأصلهم؛ بسبب إنكارهم المنكرين المَّاضين؟!

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: يقول الحق جلّ جلاله: { ألم نُهلِكِ الأولينَ } كقوم نوح وعاد وثمود، لتكذيبهم بذلك اليوم، وقُرىءَ بفتح النون، من: هلكه بمعنى أهلكه، { ثم نُتبِعُهم الآخِرِين } أي: ثم نفعل بأمثالهم من الآخرين مثل ما فعلنا بهم، لأنهم كذّبوا مثل تكذيبهم
